summary: IN THE RESENT MONTH I NOTICED MY REARVIEW MIRROR ON THE INSIDE TO APPEAR TO BE LEAKING.  IT ALSO HAS STOPPED DIMMING. EVERYTHING I SEE FROM MY MIRROR APPEARS VERY FOGGY AND HARD TO SEE. IT DIFFICULT TO BACK UP LOOKING THROUGH IT.  THE MIRROR NEVER WORKS PROPERLY SINCE THIS "LEAKING" HAS HAPPENED.  I HAVE NOT DONE ANYTHING TO FIX THIS PROBLEM YET.  THE OEM MIRROR IS $180 AT THE MERCEDES DEALER. *TR
